html: Fentanyl caused 4% of US overdose deaths in 2011. It caused 29% in 2016. 5,456 people died by overdose in Pennsylvania in 2017. The DEA says Mexican cartels are the primary distributors of fentanyl in PA. Securing the border isn’t a political football—it’s a moral imperative.
text:
Fentanyl caused 4% of US overdose deaths in 2011. It caused 29% in 2016. 5,456 people died by overdose in Pennsylvania in 2017.

The DEA says Mexican cartels are the primary distributors of fentanyl in PA. Securing the border isn’t a political football—it’s a moral imperative.

html: How is @Verizon passing along their benefits from the #TaxCutsandJobsAct? Investing in our children. Verizon said they will double their support of #STEM education programs in schools that lack resources. Learn more http://fortune.com/2018/04/02/verizon-stem-education-tax-cut/ …
text:
How is @Verizon passing along their benefits from the #TaxCutsandJobsAct?
Investing in our children.
Verizon said they will double their support of #STEM education programs in schools that lack resources. 
Learn more http://fortune.com/2018/04/02/verizon-stem-education-tax-cut/ …

html: The American people and our children deserved a better deal. 6/6
text: The American people and our children deserved a better deal. 6/6

html: The dramatically increased domestic spending level in the bipartisan budget act is the ransom demanded to fund our military. We should not be forced to bankrupt our country in order to defend our country. 5/6
text: The dramatically increased domestic spending level in the bipartisan budget act is the ransom demanded to fund our military. We should not be forced to bankrupt our country in order to defend our country. 5/6

html: The new agreement increases funding the discretionary nondefense side of the government nearly 12% this year and 15% next year above current levels. This is not spending discipline. 4/6
text: The new agreement increases funding the discretionary nondefense side of the government nearly 12% this year and 15% next year above current levels. This is not spending discipline. 4/6

html: We voted to fully fund our military 3 days ago and to continue funding other spending at 2017 levels pending a new budget agreement. 3/6
text: We voted to fully fund our military 3 days ago and to continue funding other spending at 2017 levels pending a new budget agreement. 3/6

html: But in 1990s, we learned that to get to a budget surplus, we need not just healthier growth but we need to control spending too. 2/6
text: But in 1990s, we learned that to get to a budget surplus, we need not just healthier growth but we need to control spending too. 2/6

html: The tax cuts and jobs act is creating a healthier economy. Growth above 2.6% GDP will generate more tax revenues and actually lower the deficit. 1/6
text: The tax cuts and jobs act is creating a healthier economy. Growth above 2.6% GDP will generate more tax revenues and actually lower the deficit. 1/6
